sentences.sContent: They had an argument, which culminated in Tom getting drunk.
sentences.sCn: 他们发生了争论，结果导致汤姆喝醉了酒。

synos.tran: 到绝顶；达到高潮；达到顶点

remMethod.val: culmin(顶) + ate → 达到顶点 → (以某种结果)告终； (在某一点)结束

trans.tranOther: If you say that an activity, process, or series of events culminates in or with a particular event, you mean that event happens at the end of it
